title: The Ghost of Bluebell Cottage
description: When Greg Thomas gives up a successful city careerto buy Bluebell Cottage, an idyllic retreat in the small Dorset village of Corfe, he embarks on a journey of discovery which spans centuries - and lifetimes. Guided by vivid dreams, Greg is led into a web of mysterious synchronicities which began in the seventeenth century when The Civil War raged around Corfe Castle and Matthew Hopkins decreed many innocent women to be witchesâ€¦.In this novel of ghostly encounters, Claire Voet weaves a magical story which reminds us of the spells cast by enduring love.
author: Claire Voet
